name: amenta (Visual Novel)
description:
Amenta follows Seth, a young Egyptian god, who had often dreamed of becoming a loved and respected King to Ancient Egypt.
Unfortunately, his fellow gods thinks otherwise of him.

Amenta is a short visual novel set in Ancient Egypt and an entry for
Bara Jam 2020!

Demo Feature:
Rough estimate 2k words
Original art sketches

Story and Art: Cervine Prince
Programmer & editor: FaBLe
Proof-reader & editor: Inconnu au bataillon
